content.question: The leadership of the Dutch revolts (1566-1648) sought all of the following EXCEPT

choices.label: an alliance with the English Catholics
the elimination of the rule of foreign officials

content.answer: an alliance with the English Catholics

topic.text: 3.8: Comparison in the Age of Absolutism and Constitutionalism

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
